input_ref: Fix React Error #310 (Rendered more hooks than during previous render) on the production site. The root page does a Next.js server-side redirect to /dashboard which causes hook ordering to break in th
notes: Fix React Error #310 (Rendered more hooks than during previous render) on the production site. The root page does a Next.js server-side redirect to /dashboard which causes hook ordering to break in the provider tree. Move the redirect from the page component to Next.js middleware so hooks in layout providers render consistently. This is a known Next.js issue with redirect() in server components combined with client-side providers using hooks. | status:complete | [source-artifact:20260208-203027-daa45d]
